pricingPlans.name: 10k Plan
features: First **10000 emails/mo** included in base price.

pricingPlans.name: 60k Plan
features: First **60000 emails/mo** included in base price.

saas.name: Reacher
saas.heading: **Real-Time Email Verification API**
saas.subheading: Instant email verification API that doesn't store your email lists. Free for personal use.

features.name: Yes, it scales
features.desc: Our cutting-edge infrastructure uses serverless and elastic horizontal scaling technologies. Expect to verify **1M emails in under 10 minutes**.

features.name: High Accuracy
features.desc: We won't play small, this email verification tool actually connects to the mail server and checks in real-time if the email exists. We don't use historical data.

features.name: Fully Featured
features.desc: We check for MTA, MX, SMTP, hard bounces, catch-all, disposable email... and [much more](https://www.notion.so/reacherhq/How-Reacher-Verifies-Emails-2927ca5191d744e6b15652fc08d2dd3d).

features.name: Privacy Guaranteed
features.desc: It's simple: once you get the result of your email verifications, we clear everything. We are 100% GDPR compliant.

features.name: Free for Personal Use
features.desc: Start with **50 free** emails every month. Scale with our [pay-as-you-grow](/pricing) plans afterwards.

features.name: State of the Art
features.desc: We proxy verification requests via [Tor](https://www.torproject.org/) for privacy and to avoid being blacklisted.

features.name: Bulk Verification (coming soon)
features.desc: Say goodbye to invalid email and hard bounces. Upload your dirty list and download a clean list.

features.name: Powerful API
features.desc: Advanced integrations available programatically via our [REST API](/docs#section/API).

features.name: Open Source
features.desc: In order to guarantee transparency with your data, Reacher is 100% [open source](https://github.com/reacherhq)! We also offer the possibility to self-host the service yourself.
